1.「義賊のヤツらめ……。| なぜ このオレが あの偽善者どもに| 引けを とらなき: Those bandits... Why should I take a back|seat to those hypocrites!

2.「オレが 間違ってるっていうのか！？| 答えろよ ギャスモン！: Are you saying I'm wrong? Answer me, Gaston!

3.「答エナド 必要ナイ。| 汝ハ 求メレバ 得ラレルノダ。| ソノ欲望コソガ 汝ノ: The answer is... Thou shalt seek and thou|shalt find. This desire is your power.

4.「へへっ そうか。それじゃあ| 今よりも 強い魔物を操るチカラをくれ！| 旅団を: Heh... Then give me the power to control even|stronger demons than before! I'm going to|make this brigade even bigger!

5.「マタ 魔物ヲ 操ルちからカ……。| ソロソロ 汝自身 強クナル| 必要ガ アル: You have the power to control demons... You|need to make yourself stronger, don't you?

6.「ソノ手デ 憎シミヲ 断ツタメニ……。: I'm not going to let that happen.

7.「ホウラ……。ソノコトヲ告ゲル| 使者ガ 来タヨウダ……。: I'm sorry. There's a messenger coming to tell|us what's going on.

8.「何しにきやがった。| オレを 正しい道に進ませようとか| ふざけたこと 考えて: What are you doing here? What are you doing|here, trying to get me to do the right thing,|or whatever the hell you think you're doing?

9.「チッ！ 親父と同じ 偽善者の目……。| その目を見てると むしずが走るぜ！|: Tsk! You have the same hypocritical eyes as|my father. I can't stop looking at those|eyes. Do you even know what my father did?

10.「ムーチョが 町長の家に盗みに入った日……| オレの母さんは 生死の境を さまよ:
The day Mucho broke into the mayor's house...|My mother was on the verge of life and|death... ... ...after years of serious|
|illness...

11.「うちは 貧乏でよ。薬を買う金もなかった……。| そんなとき 町長の財宝を持った:
We were poor... We had no money to buy|medicine... That's when Mucho came to our|house with the Mayor's treasure... I did a|
|little dance!

12.「……けどよ！ ムーチョは……| 親父は 母さんの まくらもとに立っても| 何も: ... But! Mucho... My father stood by my|mother's bedside and left her with nothing!

13.「次の日に 母さんは 死んだよ。| 親父は泣いてたが 今思えば あのときの涙も|: The next day, my mom died. My dad cried, but|looking back on it now, I'm sure his tears|were just a bunch of bullshit.

14.「オレは ムーチョへの復讐を誓い 家を出た。| ……そして ここにいるギャスモン: I swore revenge on Mucho, and I went home...|And then... And then I met Gathamon here, and|he gave me the power to control demons!

15.「盗賊なんて しょせん悪党……。| そのことを 世間に教えてやるために| つむじ: Thieves are nothing but scoundrels... That's|why I formed the Whirlwind Brigade, to teach|the world that!

16.「でもよ…… もう つむじ風の旅団なんて| まわりくどいことは やめるぜ。| オ: But you know... I won't be bothering with the|Whirlwind Brigade anymore... I'm going to|kill all of you directly!

17.「ギャスモン！ さあ オレにチカラをくれ！| こいつらを ひねりつぶすための|: Gathamon! Come on, give me the power! Give me|the power I need to crush these guys!

18.「スベテハ 欲望ノ オモムクママニ……。: I want to be a part of it.

19.「おお…… みなぎる みなぎるぞ！！！| 黒いチカラが オレの身体に………ッ！！: Oh... I'm full of it! I'm full of it! The|black power is in my body... !

21.「ブルルルルッ！| すべての義賊に 死を……！| 死を 死をォォォ…………ッ！！: Brrrrrr! Death to all bandits...!|Death...death...death...! Death!

22.「ブルルルルッ！！ 何度来ても同じこと！| 貴様ら 義賊は オレには勝てん！！|: Brrrrrr! It's the same thing over and over|again! You bandits are no match for me! I'm|the one who's right!

23.「ブルルルルッ！| すべての義賊に 死を……！| 死を 死をォォォ…………ッ！！: Brrrrrr! Death to all bandits...!|Death...death...death...! Death!

24.「ブ…ブルルルル……。| 憎しみに身をまかせ チカラを得た| このオレが なぜ: Bu... B-r-r-r... Why would I, who gave in to|hatred and gained strength, become a bandit?

25.「憎しみが 足りないのか……？| 義賊を…… 親父を 憎む心が……。: Don't you hate me enough? Hating the|bandits... I hate my father.

26.「この バカ息子ーーーーー！！！: You stupid son of a bitch!

27.「アンタは 母親の思いを 踏みにじる気かい！！| 妻を救えなかった 親父さんの気: You're trying to trample on your mother's|feelings! Do you have any idea how your|father felt when he couldn't save his wife?

28.「アンタの親父さんね このままじゃいけないって| あたいに 真相を話してくれたよ: Your father said he couldn't go on like this,|so he told me the truth... You should listen|to him with your ears closed!

29.「……町長の家に盗みに入った あの日| ワシは お前の母を 助けられるだけのカネ: ... The day we robbed the mayor's house, I|was going to leave enough money to save your|mother.

31.「私たちの約束を 忘れたのですか……。| そう言って カネを置いていくことを|: You've forgotten our agreement... I'm afraid|I'm going to have to ask you to leave the|money behind.

32.「約束……？| 約束って なんだよ……？: Promise...? What do you mean, promise?

33.「ワシが ムーチョになると決めたとき| 妻は いっさいの盗品を 自分たちのために: When I decided to become a moocher, my wife|wanted me to promise not to use any of the|stolen goods for ourselves...

34.「盗んだものを 少しでも 自分たちのために| 使ってしまえば それは義賊ではなく: If they use what they've stolen for|themselves, they're not thieves, they're just|thieves... That's what he said...

35.「そして 私利私欲のために 動くのではなく| 人のために尽くすことを 固く誓い|: And so, with a firm commitment to serve|others instead of working for my own personal|gain, I became Mucho...

36.「ねえ チャムール。| ふたりの心意気……。| アンタには もう わからないのか: Hey, Cha... The spirit of the two of you...|Don't you see that now?

37.「この オルゴールの音色を聞いても| 母親の優しさを 思いだせなかったのかい？: Didn't the sound of this music box remind you|of your mother's kindness?

40.「憎シミノ心ガ 消エタ……。| コノ器ハ 使エヌ。欲望ガ足リヌ……。: The hatred in my heart is gone. This|vessel... Desire is not enough...

42.「すまなかったなあ チャムール……。| もう お前を ひとりにはせん。| やり直: I'm sorry, Chamour... I've left you alone...|No... With me...

43.「……グスッ。ダメだね……。| あたい こういうのには 弱いんだ。: ...... It's no good... I'm not good at this|kind of thing...

44.「……さてと これにて 一件落着だね。| つむじ風の旅団も いなくなったし| ブ: ... Well, that's it. The Whirlwind Brigade is|gone, and Bdecho and the others are no longer|at odds...

45.「<cs_pchero> 今回も また大活躍だったね。| その礼をするからさ|: <cs_pchero>You've done a great job again. I'm going to|pay you back. I'll see you at the tavern in|Gara.

47.「<pc>よ。| お前には オルゴールの件や| 今回の件で 本当に 世話になった: <pc> I'm sorry. You've been really helpful with|the music box and this...

48.「その恩返しに 盗賊の必殺技を| お前に 伝授しよう。| さあ 目を つむるがよ: And to return the favor, I'm going to teach|you the art of the bandit. Now, close your|eyes...

50.「その恩返しに これを受け取ってくれ。| 大事に 使うんだぞ。: And to return the favor, I received this...|I'll take good care of it.

51.「お前は 盗賊を極められる器だ。| 時が満ちたら ワシの所へ来るがいい。| もち: You will be a master thief... And when the|time is right, you'll come to me. Of course,|I won't forget to become a bandit.

52.「とっておきの 試練を用意しといてやろう。| では またな。: I've prepared a special ordeal for you. So...

53.「ブ…ブデチョのオッサン！| あ！ いや！ ムーチョ先生っ！！: B... Old man Budecho! Oh! No! Mr. Mucho!

54.「あたいを 弟子にしてくれないかい！？| あたい マスク・ド・ムーチョに あこが: Will you make me your apprentice? I came into|this world because I adore the mask de mooch!|Please!

55.「すまんな。ワシは もう| 弟子は とらないことにしてるんだ。: I... I've decided not to take on any more|apprentices.

56.「もう……ってことは| すでに お弟子さんが いるのかい！？: Already... So you already have a student?

57.「どこで ワシの正体を知ったのか| ちょっと前に 怪盗ポイなんとかって女の子が|: I don't know how you knew who I was, but a|while ago, a girl named Phantom Thief Poy|something came to me.

58.「もともと 弟子をとるつもりは なかったが| かわいい顔で 熱心に頼みこんできた:
I hadn't intended to take on an apprentice in|the first place, but he had such a cute face|and was so eager to ask me, I couldn't say|
|no.

59.「ところが そのコ なかなか スジがよくて| 今は 彼女の指導で 手いっぱいなん: But she's a good girl, and I've got my hands|full with her right now. So, sorry...|Hahaha...
